page.title: 15Rising Brook & Moss Pit.
page.content: This area is situated just off the M6 motorway about a mile from Stafford town centre. Most of it is residential about 80% housing, 1% shops and garages and the remainder a play area. Included in the area is a dominant wood supplier Cox Long on Silkmore Lane. The Wolverhampton Road divides the area into two, most of the shops and the school being on the Rising Brook side. There is a distinct lack of leisure facilities apart from a pub and betting shop. There are 16 shops in the area ranging from a Co-op supermarket to privately owned grocers and hardware stores. Many pensioners live in bungalows on the Rising Brook side.
